name: umami
description: Umami is a self-hosted, privacy-friendly web analytics platform. It uses a small tracking script and offers clean dashboards, goal tracking, and multi-site support, with an optional hosted cloud service.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor web traffic and user sessions with a GA-like dashboard to easily track conversion, web

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance with built-in consent management, data anonymization, and configurable retention policies

features.title: User Attribution
features.description: Track user journeys across devices and sessions with cross-domain tracking, UTM parameters, and referral source

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal script size ensures fast page loads without impacting site performance or user experience

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share insights with role-based access controls, collaborative annotations on charts, and scheduled report delivery to

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with third-party tools via REST APIs, webhooks, and native integrations to centralize data and
